### break / next
```{R}
#break(跳出迴圈)
for(n in 1:10){
  if(n==5){
    break
  }
  print(n)
}

#next(略過本次,類似python pass)
for(n in 1:10){
  if(n==5){
    next
  }
  print(n)
}

```
